item.title: Network Plus Course:
item.category: "CompTIA Network Plus" , "IT Certification" , "Cybersecurity" , "Data Security" , "Network Administration" , "Technology Education" , "Professional Development" , "Digital Skills" , "Information Technology" , "Online Learning"
item.description: Learn the best practices for secure asset disposal in network security, including factory reset, wiping configurations, and sanitization methods to ensure data security.

item.title: Should You Learn Programming for IT and Cyber Security?
item.category: "IT and Cyber Security" , "Programming Skills" , "Career Advancement" , "Automation" , "Command Line" , "Scripting" , "Infrastructure Deployment" , "Data Analysis" , "Security Testing" , "Professional Development"
item.description: Learn why mastering programming skills can greatly benefit your IT and Cyber Security career, and how to get started with PowerShell, Bash, Python, Ansible, Packer, and Terraform.
